title: Organic Farm Food
description: Organic Farm Food is a website for fresh farm products with a clean UI and smooth navigation, built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.

title: Blog Sphere
description: BlogSphere is a full-stack blogging website built with React, Express.js, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS, featuring a clean UI, smooth animations, and seamless blog management.

title: BroCode Agency
description: BroCode Agency is a responsive website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering a modern and user-friendly interface for various services and products.

title: ShopEase
description: ShopEase is a sleek and responsive e-commerce website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It provides a seamless shopping experience with modern UI components and intuitive navigation.

title: Portfolio
description: My portfolio website showcases my skills, projects, and experience in web development. It features a modern design, smooth animations, and responsive layout.

title: Mehndi Artist Portfolio
description: A beautifully designed personal portfolio website for a Mehndi artist, showcasing services, gallery, and contact information. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a focus on aesthetic visuals and responsiveness.

title: Smart Calculator
description: Smart Calculator is a responsive and functional web calculator built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It supports basic arithmetic operations and features a clean, modern UI.

title: Stone Paper Scissors
description: A fun and interactive Stone-Paper-Scissors game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to play against the computer with real-time scoring and smooth UI animations.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Tic Tac Toe is a classic 2-player game developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project includes turn-based logic, win detection, and a simple, responsive layout.
